description: Cameron McGeehan's equaliser earns Northampton a point at fellow League One strugglers Shrewsbury.
title: Shrewsbury Town 1-1 Northampton Town
title_page: Shrewsbury Town 1-1 Northampton Town - BBC Sport
maintext:
Shrewsbury Town produced a league double over Northampton Town last season and will be looking to win three such matches in succession for the first time since November 2011. On that occasion the Shrews won the third match in that streak 7-2.
Northampton Town have won three of their last five away league games against Shrewsbury Town (L2), more than in their previous 20 away combined (W2 D3 L15).
Shrewsbury have lost their final league game in each of the last two years, losing 1-0 in both against Cheltenham in 2022 and Burton in 2023.
